title: The incentive FSI admissible against the FSI required for rehabilitation, shall be based on the ratio (hereinafter referred to as Basic Ratio ) of Land Rate (LR ), in Rs/sq
clause_text: The incentive FSI admissible against the FSI required for rehabilitation, shall be based on the ratio (hereinafter referred to as Basic Ratio ) of Land Rate (LR ), in Rs/sq. m, of the lands included in the Urban Renewal Cluster, as per the Annual Statement of Rates (ASR
